alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:17PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chicot County, northeastern East Carroll and northeastern West Carroll Parishes, southwestern Washington and northwestern Issaquena Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oak Grove, or 8 miles west of Lake Providence, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Shelburn around 225 PM CDT. Millikin and Gassoway around 235 PM CDT. Glen Allan around 250 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Kilbourne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
